languages.text: "Оставь свою ложь. Лишь отголоски крови связывают Азуриани и Темных, подобных тебе".

traits.locale_text: "Оставь свою ложь. Лишь отголоски крови связывают Азуриани и Темных, подобных тебе".

languages.text: "Do not waste breath on your lies. Only the faint vestiges of blood connect the Asuryani and Dark Ones such as yourself."
languages.original_text: "Оставь свою ложь. Лишь отголоски крови связывают Азуриани и Темных, подобных тебе".

traits.locale_text: "Don't waste breath on your lies. Only the faint vestiges of blood connect the Asuryan and the Dark Ones like yourself."
"Don't waste breath on your lies. Only the faint vestiges of blood connect the Asuryan and the Dark Ones like yourself."
"Do not waste breath on your lies. Only the faint vestiges of blood connect the Asuryani and Dark Ones such as yourself."
"Do not waste breath on your lies. Only the faint vestiges of blood connect the Asuryani and Dark Ones such as yourself."
"Do not waste breath on your lies. Only the faint vestiges of blood connect the Asuryani and Dark Ones such as yourself."

languages.text: 「嘘で息を無駄にしないで。アシュリヤーニとあなたのような暗黒の者とをつなげるのは、かすかな血の名残りだけ」
languages.original_text: "Do not waste breath on your lies. Only the faint vestiges of blood connect the Asuryani and Dark Ones such as yourself."

traits.locale_text: 「嘘で息を無駄にしないで。アシュリヤーニとあなたのような暗黒の者とをつなげるのは、かすかな血の名残りだけ」

languages.text: « Ne gâchez pas votre salive. Il n'y a désormais que de faibles liens de sang entre les Asuryanis et vous autres, les Eldars noirs. »
languages.original_text: "Do not waste breath on your lies. Only the faint vestiges of blood connect the Asuryani and Dark Ones such as yourself."

traits.locale_text: « Ne gâchez pas votre salive. Il n'y a désormais que de faibles liens de sang entre les Asuryanis et vous autres, les Eldars noirs. »

languages.text: “不要在谎言上浪费口舌了，我们方舟灵族与你们这样的黑暗子嗣几乎已经不再有什么血缘关系。”
languages.original_text: "Do not waste breath on your lies. Only the faint vestiges of blood connect the Asuryani and Dark Ones such as yourself."

traits.locale_text: “不要在谎言上浪费口舌了，我们方舟灵族与你们这样的黑暗子嗣几乎已经不再有什么血缘关系。”

languages.text: «No gastes saliva en mentiras. A los Asuryani y a los Oscuros como tú solo nos une un sutil hilo de sangre».
languages.original_text: "Do not waste breath on your lies. Only the faint vestiges of blood connect the Asuryani and Dark Ones such as yourself."

traits.locale_text: «No gastes saliva en mentiras. A los Asuryani y a los Oscuros como tú solo nos une un sutil hilo de sangre».

languages.text: "Vergeudet Euren Atem nicht für Lügen. Nur die schwachen Überreste des Bluts verbinden die Asuryani mit Dunklen wie Euch."
languages.original_text: "Do not waste breath on your lies. Only the faint vestiges of blood connect the Asuryani and Dark Ones such as yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Vergeudet Euren Atem nicht für Lügen. Nur die schwachen Überreste des Bluts verbinden die Asuryani mit Dunklen wie Euch."

languages.text: "Yalanlarla nefesini boşuna tüketme. Asuryaniler ile senin gibi Karalar'ı birbirine bağlayan, belli belirsiz bir damla kandan başka bir şey değildir."
languages.original_text: "Do not waste breath on your lies. Only the faint vestiges of blood connect the Asuryani and Dark Ones such as yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Yalanlarla nefesini boşuna tüketme. Asuryaniler ile senin gibi Karaları birbirine bağlayan, belli belirsiz bir damla kandan başka bir şey değildir."
